Daffy:
Ah ... The trouble. There was only one. What does this mean? I mean sleuths. At first there were 10 ... almost all ate the local monsters, there is only one dog.
The king, say hello. (Dog King welcomes barking) What ... You need to save at least this dog ... I can no longer see it. Help me, I beg you. King, ask for help. Come on. (King looks and whining piteously)
